channel.title: Feedback Request - Brinkwood (Forged in the Dark) Special Abilities
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm looking for feedback on my Forged in the Dark hack, Brinkwood, especially on the "Special Abilities" section for each "Mask," though any feedback is welcome. Masks are my version of playbooks, except they're change-able from score to score. Any feedback, comment, or critique is most appreciated!
Check here for the specific section, feel free to comment directly on it: http://bit.ly/BW-MaskFeedback
Or here for the current game prototype: https://erikthebearik.itch.io/brinkwood
